hero.title: Who we are and what we do?
hero.subtitle: BLASTSERV - we are a young and dynamic team with a passion who have been involved in the blasting and painting industry for years. Our range includes machines for manual and automatic blasting process, wet and powder painting, drying booths and ovens. We are happy to answer any questions and provide expert advice.

products.title: Daily member engagement
products.subtitle: Your Company reaches and motivates individuals struggling to adhere to care plans, rewarding them for healthy behaviors.
products.description: Our science-backed platform is built on the principles of behavioral economics to work for the hardest-to-reach populations.

testimonials.quote: We securely sent our database of hard-to-reach patients with all their relevant conditions, and the number of patients we wanted to enroll. This platform did all the heavy lifting, including patient outreach and activation.
testimonials.author: Dr. Brian Hodgkins
testimonials.title: Executive Vice President of Clinical Operations

testimonials.quote: Being able to offer a program that is so engaging and motivating to our members is a game changer. We have seen significant improvements in our members' health outcomes and quality of life.
testimonials.author: Jill Feldman
testimonials.title: Chief Operating Officer

testimonials.quote: After starting our members on this platform, we've seen significant decreases in utilization and improved outcomes. The program more than paid for itself.
testimonials.author: Ian Straayer
testimonials.title: Manager of Quality Improvement

testimonials.quote: Seeing more than 90% of our members engage with this platform daily is a testament to the program's effectiveness. We've seen significant improvements in our members' health outcomes and quality of life.
testimonials.author: Renee Kieffer
testimonials.title: Nurse Practitioner

contact.title: Talk to our team
contact.subtitle: Learn how Wellth can impact health, cost, and quality outcomes for your organization.

items.title: Shot Blasting Machine
items.description: High-performance shot blasting machine for efficient surface preparation and cleaning.

items.title: Pipes Shot Blasting
items.description: Specialized shot blasting system designed for cleaning and preparing pipe surfaces.

items.title: Roller Conveyor Shot Blasting
items.description: Automated shot blasting system with roller conveyor for continuous surface treatment.

items.title: Powder Coating Booth
items.description: State-of-the-art powder coating booth for high-quality surface finishing.

items.title: Spray Booth
items.description: Professional spray booth system for precise and controlled coating applications.

items.title: Tunnel Type Shot Blasting
items.description: Large-scale tunnel shot blasting system for industrial surface preparation.

items.title: Repair
items.description: We solve any issues and remove breakdowns. The knowledge and experience we have allow us to get the job done quickly.

items.title: Maintenance
items.description: We perform technical surveys. This allows for trouble-free and efficient operation of the machine.

items.title: Spare parts
items.description: We provide all spare parts for shotblasting machines from leading manufacturers.
